LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerStartCraftingGizmoDescriptio: Select an organ to grow. Colonists will begin filling the vat with the required ingredients.
LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerStopCraftingGizmoDescription: Stops the growing process. Refunds inserted ingredients if the process was not started.
LanguageData.QE_CustomNameCompGizmoDescription: Sets a custom name which can be easily identifiable.
LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerGenomesHint: No available genomes. Get them by making 'Genome Sequencers' in machining tables, then use them.
LanguageData.QE_AlertMaintenanceRequiredExplanation: These growers require maintenance or they will lose what they are growing and materials will be wasted!\n\nSend a doctor or researcher to maintain at once.
LanguageData.QE_LetterHumanlikeGrownDescription: Welcome vatgrown clone {PAWN_labelShort} to the colony!\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} has no natural skills, but you can apply a brain scan template on {PAWN_objective} to give {PAWN_objective} a skillset right away.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectNoValidBed: {0} is a valid target, but no available bed could be found.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectDead: {PAWN_labelShort} was rejected because {PAWN_pronoun} is dead and has no brain activity.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectNotClone: {PAWN_labelShort} was rejected because {PAWN_pronoun} is not a clone.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectAlreadyTemplated: {PAWN_labelShort} was rejected because {PAWN_pronoun} already has a brain template.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectExcludedHediff: {PAWN_labelShort} was rejected because {PAWN_pronoun} has a hediff that excludes {PAWN_objective} from brain scanning.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectExcludedRace: {0} is not a valid race for brain scanning.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectNotAnimal: {0} was rejected because this template can only be applied to animals.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectNotHumanlike: {0} was rejected because this template can't be applied to an animal.
LanguageData.QE_BedIsNotMedical: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is not medical
LanguageData.QE_BedUnreachableBySurgeon: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - {SURGEON_labelShort} can't reach or reserve it
LanguageData.QE_BedTooDangerous: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - too dangerous for {PATIENT_labelShort}
LanguageData.QE_BedSurgeonAlreadyReserved: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is already reserved by {SURGEON_labelShort}
LanguageData.QE_BedOccupied: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is already occupied
LanguageData.QE_BedForbidden: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is forbidden
LanguageData.QE_BedIsBurning: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is burning
LanguageData.QE_BedImproperForPrisoner: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - {PATIENT_labelShort} is prisoner, bed not for prisoners
LanguageData.QE_BedNotInPrisonCell: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - {PATIENT_labelShort} is prisoner, bed not in prison cell
LanguageData.QE_BedImproperFaction: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed not owned by {SURGEON_labelShort}'s faction
LanguageData.QE_PrisonerBedForNonPrisoner: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - {PATIENT_labelShort} is not prisoner, bed is for prisoners
LanguageData.QE_BedHasAnotherOwner: Invalid bed '{0}'. Reason - bed is owned by another pawn
LanguageData.QE_BedSelected: {0} has been selected for brain templating operation
LanguageData.QE_OrganGrowthDurationTooltip: Higher values = more time required to grow organs. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.QE_OrganIngredientMultTooltip: Higher values = more ingredients required to grow organs. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.QE_CloneGrowthDurationTooltip: Higher values = more time required to grow clones. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.QE_CloneIngredientMultTooltip: Higher values = more ingredients required to grow clones. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.QE_VatMaintTimeTooltip: Higher values = maintenance required less frequently. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.QE_DebugLoggingTooltip: Enable debug logging for the mod. Helpful if you're running into unepected behavior with the mod. Default: Disabled
LanguageData.QE_MaintenanceWorkThresholdTooltip: Give a pawn the 'Maintain Vat' job at this percentage of maintenance remaining. Default: 40%
LanguageData.QE_GiveCloneNegativeThought: Give new clones 'vatgrown clone' negative thought
LanguageData.QE_GiveCloneNegativeThoughtTooltip: When a humanlike clone is grown, give it a temporary negative thought to indicate confusion about the new environment. Default: Enabled
LanguageData.QE_BlankGenomeTemplateDescription: This template was generated via a game event or debug commands. It is unusuable in the cloning vat.
LanguageData.QE_CloningPawnNullMessage: The clone pawn in the Cloning Vat is broken and attempts to fix it failed. Aborting clone process, refunding ingredients, and resetting vat.
LanguageData.QE_CloningMaintFailMessage: Cloning process failed for clone of {SOURCEPAWNNAME}. Reason - Vat not maintained
LanguageData.QE_CloningMaintFailFallbackMessage: Cloning process failed. Reason - Vat not maintained
LanguageData.QE_OrgaVatMaintFailMessage: {ORGANNAME} creation failed. Reason - Vat not maintained
LanguageData.QE_OrgaVatMaintFailFallbackMessage: Organ creation failed. Reason - Vat not maintained
